Interface OvalResultRepository

All Known Subinterfaces:
OvalRepository
All Known Implementing Classes:

public interface OvalResultRepository

A prescription of the OVAL result repository basic operations.

Method Detail

findOvalResultsById

OvalResults findOvalResultsById(String id)
Returns the OVAL Results Document of the specified ID. If no such object exists, this method returns null.

Parameters:
id - the ID.
Returns:
the OVAL Results Document if exists, null otherwise.
Throws:
OvalRepositoryException - when an exceptional condition occurred during the OVAL repository processing.
